p: Synthesis of 1-butyl-3-methylimidazoliumphosphate ( 6) [ 38]. In a 250 mL round bottom flask, 20.25 g (0.11 mol) of 5 and 13.4 mL (0.11 mol) of TMP were consecutively added, and the mixture was heated at 60 °C for 5 h; the product 1-butyl-3-methylimidazolium dimethylphosphate was then obtained in quantitative yield. 1H-NMR (200 MHz, CDCl 3, ppm): δ = 9.56 (s, 1H), 7.87 (m, 1H), 7.7 (m, 1H), 4.16 (t, 2H, J = 7.1 Hz), 3.83 (s, 3H), 3.30 (d, 6H, J = 10.6 Hz), 1.71 (m, 2H), 1.22 (m, 2H), 0.84 (t, 3H, J = 7.4 Hz).
